allequal[source]

allequal(l)

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
test_eq(allequal([3,3,3]), True)
test_eq(allequal([]), True)
test_eq(allequal([1,2,3]), False)
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

mergeds[source]

mergeds(ds)

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
ds = [{'a':2}, {'b':3}, {'a':1}, {'c':0}, {'b':5}, {'a':3}]
test_eq(mergeds(ds), {'a':[2,1,3], 'b':[3,5], 'c':[0]})

Get files

{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_files[source]

get_files(path, extensions=None, recurse=True, folders=None, followlinks=True)

Get all the files in path with optional extensions, optionally with recurse, only in folders, if specified. From fastai

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_image_files[source]

get_image_files(path, recurse=True, folders=None)

Get image files in path recursively, only in folders, if specified. From fastai

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
fns = get_image_files('samples')
# expect = [Path(f'samples/imgs/{n}.jpg') for n in [549220, 324158, 279278]]
# test_eq(fns, expect)
